title: Gifted
description: Andy has a gift. With a touch he can give anyone abilities. They will never again be sick, enjoy enhanced speed, strength, and senses, and be granted powers most only read or dream about. However, a gang of vampire like people, led by Marcus, have discovered what Andy can do and will stop at nothing to capture him. While trying to escape from them, Andy meets Mike and John and gifts them. It falls upon Mike, John, and others Andy has gifted to protect him from the gang. In the process, they sharpen their talents against each other, build relationships, and prepare for what promised to be the fight of their lives.
author: Jim   Ellis
